screenshots.caption: Keyboard layout with AltGr pressed down.
Keyboard layout with AltGr + Shift pressed down.

name: IPA keyboard layout (Windows)
short_description: This is an IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet) keyboard layout, made for linguists by linguists. There are very few tools for comprehensive IPA input available, some of those are strictly online, some of them cost money, and others yet are difficult to install and operate. I tried to make a free to use, free to distribute IPA keyboard for linguists to use both at home / in the office, and during fieldwork. So far the project is in its preliminary stages, as I have not received any major feedback, but if it interests other people I will continue developing it. Nevertheless, the input is fully usable, and contains a large number of IPA characters (almost all of them, in fact), and several diacritics.
summary: An IPA keyboard layout for linguists (usable only in Windows)
